| Overview                = The '''House of Jumbo Carnation''' was a drag house founded to honor the [[Homo superior|mutant]] fashion icon, [[Jumbo Carnation (Earth-616)|Jumbo Carnation]].<ref name="JC">{{cite web|url=http://www.marvunapp.com/Appendix8/jumbocarnation.xm.htm|title=Marvel Universe App: Jumbo Carnation|author=Marvel|work=Marvel Universe App|date= |accessdate=18 August 2020}}</ref>

| HistoryText             = Years after the death of [[Jumbo Carnation (Earth-616)|Jumbo Carnation]], a group of gay men and drag queens (including [[Krystal M'Kraan (Earth-616)|Krystal M'Kraan]]) in [[New York City]] founded the '''House of Jumbo Carnation''' to honor his memory.{{r|War of the Realms: War Scrolls Vol 1 2}}<ref name="JC"/>{{r|Lords of Empyre: Emperor Hulkling Vol 1 1}}

Representing the House of Jumbo Carnation, Krystal M'Kraan has performed at nightclubs and brunch bars.{{r|Lords of Empyre: Emperor Hulkling Vol 1 1}}{{r|War of the Realms: War Scrolls Vol 1 2}}
